value.name: Family of man who died after Phoenix police held him on hot asphalt claim wrongful death
value.description: The family of Ramon Timothy Lopez, who died last fall while in Phoenix police custody, has filed a $5 million notice of claim against the City of Phoenix and its police department alleging ...

value.name: Body cam video shows confrontation of man who died in police custody
value.description: The Phoenix Police Department released body cam videos of the confrontation between officers and Ramon Timothy Lopez, a suspect who died in the custody of the authorities.
